mapper.select:
select
,
from activity where has_deleted = 0 and ban_status = 0

select
,
from activity where worker_id = #{workerId,jdbcType=INTEGER} and has_deleted = 0

select
,
from activity where
province = #{activitySearchQuery.province} and
city = #{activitySearchQuery.city} and
area = #{activitySearchQuery.area} and
name like "%"#{activitySearchQuery.activityName}"%" and
has_deleted = 0 and ban_status = 0
select count(*) from activity where YEAR(create_time) <= #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER} and has_deleted = 0
